transcript: if I have a book that says how to Market a book and it has 10 reviews on Amazon do I need to consume the book no I already know the book sucks cuz I have evidence that the book sucks I have visual proof that everything you're saying is not true or that you weren't even doing it it's just like the teacher who says I'm giving Financial advice to people and they're like my advice is better than Warren Buffett it's like yeah sure you just forgot to build an $800 billion company no big deal right that's it it's the lens that everyone's going to perceive everything you say through I want people to have the evidence so that when they speak about something they can be confident about it confident because they have a high degree of probability that it is true because they've experienced it
